title: Album of Memories
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Hey, hey, look! I found this when I was cleaning the storage room! Brings back memories, doesn’t it~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Is that.... an album?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Yup. Look, remember this one?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>! We had a picture of this!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Ufufu, it really takes you back, right~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Yeah. Kanan-san caught a small tree frog....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>And both of us made a big fuss about it~. You almost cried back then, Dia.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Y-, you almost did too, Mari-san! I vividly remember it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>But Kanan kept saying how cute it was, so we slowly opened up to it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>And finally, the three of us released the frog on a lush green field. Fufu, how nostalgic. Since we found it, why don’t we call Kanan-san over to look at this album with us?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
